pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Three Episodes of WNYC’s "Know Your City," 1949-1950 on five LPs. On this quiz show, New York City school children answer questions about their city. The quizmaster is "Aunt Edith," or Edith McGinnis, who went on to become Manhattan’s first Borough Historian.  Topics include Flatbush, with John Cashmore, the Brooklyn Borough President, as a special guest; the history of labor in New York City; and the history of the retail industry in New York City.
